projects.title: Smart Prescription Device
projects.summary: Team capstone project for Human-Centered Design & Engineering, sponsored by Seattle Children's Hospital. We designed and developed a physical device to track post-surgical patients' opioid prescriptions and notify them when a new dose of medication is ready.

projects.title: Netflix Gamepad Interface Plugin
projects.summary: Chrome plugin designed to provide a user-friendly interface for controlling Netflix with a gamepad or game controller, allowing users to enjoy Netflix in a browser without sitting at their PC. Functional work in progress.

projects.title: Dominion Randomizer
projects.summary: Web application that randomizes card sets, based on user-specified parameters, for the card game Dominion that requires players to randomly pick ten of up to hundreds of possible cards during game setup.

projects.title: UW Course Seat Claimer
projects.summary: Java 8 GUI application designed to listen to a user's email inbox for open seat notifications on full classes and register the user for the open seat, dropping conflicting courses if specified.

projects.title: Gamepads.js
projects.summary: JavaScript library providing a standardized way of handling gamepads, gamepad events, and gamepad button icons. This library provides support for button and joystick events that the built-in HTML5 gamepads API does not offer. Created for use in my Netflix Gamepad Interface browser plugin.

projects.title: FormPersistence.js
projects.summary: JavaScript library for preserving HTML form data across multiple sessions by saving data to web storage.

projects.title: pseudo:styler
projects.summary: JavaScript library for toggling pseudo-class styles (like :hover) on HTML elements. Created for use in my Netflix Gamepad Interface browser plugin. Co-authored with Tyler Sedlar. My contributions include redesigning the library to store pseudoclass rules in a hidden stylesheet, handling selector edge cases, and writing library documentation.

projects.title: ElTag Tutorial
projects.summary: Tutorial for ElTag, an HTML tag component framework. This tutorial walks through making a simple calculator with ElTag.

projects.title: RuneDream
projects.summary: Java 7 GUI application designed to automate gameplay of the popular online game RuneScape, with support for user-created automation plugins. Worked with a team to create a website and online community to deliver and support the application, which was downloaded over 50,000 times. Defunct. Public API repository linked.

projects.title: BBC Sound Downloader
projects.summary: Python script designed to download all 16,000+ sounds from BBC's Sound Effects library, which must otherwise be downloaded one at a time.

projects.title: Gene Ontology Database Search
projects.summary: Java 7 GUI application implementing a term frequencyâ€“inverse document frequency function for searching a gene/symptom database and displaying relevant results. Created during a research internship at Scripps Translational Science Institute.

projects.title: Crypto Mining Tax Calculator
projects.summary: Node.js script that determines all income events received by given cryptocurrency addresses and the value of those income events at the time they occurred. Useful for calculating taxes and cost basis from mining or acquiring cryptocurrency.

projects.title: Online Portfolio
projects.summary: This website, created to showcase my portfolio of work. Project page contents are written in Markdown and loaded into a single-page application. Hosted on GitHub Pages.

projects.title: MyPlan Usability Study
projects.summary: Usability research study exploring the effectiveness of the University of Washington's MyPlan tool, which allows students to register for classes and plan their college coursework. Quarter-long team project for HCDE 417.

projects.title: FloraFinders Plant Identifier App Concept
projects.summary: App concept created following the user-centered design process to identify plants by capturing them on the phone's camera. Quarter-long team project for HCDE 455.

projects.title: OrderFresh App Concept
projects.summary: App concept created following the user-centered design process to connect people with the farmers that supply their grocery stores and farmers markets. Quarter-long team project for HCDE 318. See linked project portfolio website.

projects.title: Accessible CSS Grids
projects.summary: JavaScript library for making CSS grids accessible to people with screen readers by altering the source order of grid elements to match the order in which they are displayed.

projects.title: PUBG Config Parser
projects.summary: JavaScript library for parsing PlayerUnknown Battlegrounds' custom INI-like configuration file for settings such as keybindings. Created for use in Overwolf plugins.

projects.title: YouTube Uninterrupted Plugin
projects.summary: Chrome plugin that unpauses YouTube when background videos are paused periodically.

projects.title: Textube
projects.summary: Java desktop application that offered keyboard shortcuts to upload text/files to my custom URL shortening, file hosting server or evaluate simple mathematical expressions from the clipboard. Defunct.

projects.title: Laser Tag Gun
projects.summary: Arduino-powered prototype designed to communicate with other Arduinos via XBee radio modules to create a laser tag game. Final project for HCDE 439.

projects.title: RedBull Cross Cultural Analysis
projects.summary: Cross-cultural analysis of Red Bull's American and Chinese websites, comparing how each website is designed to cater to different cultures. Final project for HCDE 301.

projects.title: Infinity Mirror
projects.summary: 3D printed infinity mirror and prototyping build process. Final project for HCDE 451.
